title: Ticket #1103: Batch file to create packaging of Win32 MSI installer fails
description:
Running msconfig\dopackaging.bat bombs out w/ a failure.

The problem appears to be the header files include path for building condor_setup, which is done as part of the packaging (not ideal).
remarks:
2010-Jan-12 14:45:07 by tannenba:
Pushed patch to V7_4-branch, merged to master. Patch simply adds the required include path. Resolving.
check_ins: 2010-Jan-12 14:40   Check-in [16866]: Fix to batch file that creates Win32 MSI package. gittrac #1103. (note: we do not need a note in the version history about this) (By Todd Tannenbaum )
creator: tannenba
